statements: DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 1000 AND cost < 500;
DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > 100 AND transportation_mode = 'Truck'
DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_id = 100 AND transport_mode = 'Truck';
DELETE FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE saving_area = 'Logistics' AND potential_savings > 5000;
DELETE FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_name = 'Highway Route' AND route_type = 'Truck';
DELETE FROM transportation_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Transport';
